destroy.failure: We could not destroy your Fleet.

vehicle.destroy: Are you sure you want to remove this Ship from you Hangar?

hangar.import:
Imported ships will be added to your Hangar without matching to exisiting Ships.

Supported Formats are: Fleetyards Export, Starship42 or HangarXplor.

Do you want to continue?
hangar.destroySelected: Are you sure you want to remove all Selected Ships from you Hangar? This Action can't be reverted.
hangar.destroyAll: Are you sure you want to remove all Ships from you Hangar? This Action can't be reverted.

wishlist.destroyAll: Are you sure you want to remove all Ships from you Wishlist? This Action can't be reverted.

tradeRoutes.reset: Are you sure you want to reset all commodity prices?

shopCommodity.destroy: Are you sure you want to destroy this Commodity? This Action can't be reverted.

members.destroy: Are you sure you want to remove this Member?

invites.decline: Are you sure you want to decline this Invite? This Action can't be reverted.
